SELECT id, title, content FROM d_quiz
is_check = 1
and (title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
SELECT q.id, q.user_id, q.title, q.is_check, q.is_solve, q.like_number, q.collect_number, q.create_time, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM d_quiz q LEFT JOIN u_user u on u.id = q.user_id WHERE q.is_check = 1

SELECT q.id, q.title, q.content, q.images, q.like_number, q.collect_number, q.create_time, q.update_time, q.user_id, q.is_solve, u.avatar, u.nickname FROM (SELECT id, user_id, title, content, images, like_number, collect_number, is_solve, create_time, update_time FROM d_quiz WHERE is_check = 1 AND id = #{quizId}) q LEFT JOIN u_user u ON q.user_id = u.id
SELECT q.id, q.title, u.avatar as img FROM d_quiz q LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = q.user_id WHERE q.is_check = 1 AND q.id < #{quizId} ORDER BY q.id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT q.id, q.title, u.avatar as img FROM d_quiz q LEFT JOIN u_user u ON u.id = q.user_id WHERE q.is_check = 1 AND q.id > #{quizId} ORDER BY q.id LIMIT 1
select q.id, q.title, q.create_time, u.avatar as img from d_quiz q left join u_user u on u.id = q.user_id where is_check = 1 order by create_time desc

select q.id, q.title, q.create_time, q.content, u.avatar, u.nickname from (select id, title, create_time, user_id, SUBSTR(content, 1, 80) AS content from d_quiz where is_check = 1 order by create_time DESC LIMIT 20) q LEFT JOIN u_user u ON q.user_id = u.id
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM d_quiz GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC
